description.translate: At the intersection of extreme thinking and the last quarter of an hour, there is a large pile of tissue.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Raison inexistante\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7A l'intersection de l'extrême pensée et du dernier\"}","{\"text\":\"§7quart d'heure, se trouve une grande pile de tissus.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7At the intersection of extreme thinking and the last\"}","{\"text\":\"§7quarter of an hour, there is a large pile of tissue.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a5 §7HER§a5 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§c-6\"}"],color:16714478}}
